title: Continuation of U.S. Drug Interdiction Assistance to the Government of Colombia
summary: The document is a presidential determination (No. 202507) issued on August 4, 2025, regarding the continuation of U.S. drug interdiction assistance to Colombia. The President certifies that interdiction of aircraft suspected of illicit drug trafficking in Colombian airspace is necessary due to the extraordinary threat posed by drug trafficking to Colombia's national security. Additionally, it is certified that Colombia has appropriate procedures in place to protect against innocent loss of life, including effective means to identify and warn aircraft before force is used. The Secretary of State is directed to publish this determination in the Federal Register and notify Congress.
